title: Issue a Rent Increase Notice
description: A landlord wants to increase the rent for a month-to-month tenant. The PM must issue a legally compliant notice.

tasks.description: Determine the legally required notice period for a rent increase in the property's jurisdiction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks local regulations and confirms a 60-day notice is required.

tasks.description: Draft a formal rent increase notice with the new rental amount and the date it becomes effective.
tasks.expected_outcome: A compliant notice is created with all the required information.

tasks.description: Deliver the notice to the tenant according to legal requirements (e.g., certified mail or personal service).
tasks.expected_outcome: The notice is sent via certified mail, and the tracking number is logged.
